title: why i don't get blue essence after i win a game ?
body: i play a lot of games and after i win a game , i get only  XP , where is my BE ?

replies.body: Hey guys, the Support team are not developers so we don't have jurisdiction over  this.  ><  I hear your feedback, but your best bet would be to reach out to our devs on the [Gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards.  Cactopus also reached out last night and gave more visibility and announced some adjustments.  Check it out in this [post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments)!

Nice job. Typical money hungry corporation. "Hey it isn't the support team's fault that Riot is greedy." Of course it's not the support team's fault, but that doesn't change the fact that it's a cash grab. Riot is worth over a billion dollars, makes tons of money daily because people love the skins, and is still slow to fix client issues, etc. I love the in-game experience and enjoy the game as a whole, but Riot is an evil company. Coming from someone who develops for a job, your client is terrible. Sure you switched to Electron from whatever Adobe shit you were using, but it took Riot a very long time to write an interface that's really just a glorified website bundled with it's own Chromium instance--and all the underlying client connection issues, etc. are STILL THERE. If the client disconnects, it never reconnects; it just says "Attempting to reconnect" and then forces you to restart. I highly doubt it actually does anything to reconnect. I don't have the energy or dedication to make my own MOBA, but Riot should seriously reconsider this Blue Essence deal: don't you make enough money off a super-loyal player base?

Blue essence is now rewarded through leveling up, and no longer after a match.

They are also available with honor and mastery as well.  More info on our [breakdown ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-BE-XP-System-Breakdown)guide.

Update: First win of the day may be adjusted to offer BE.  Check out [Cactopus' post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments) for more details.

This is seriously not a good system,_** players hate Rng, because we don't want to pray to the RNG gods that I get the champion shard I wanted**_.  While yes I can buy the champions with Blue Essence, the fact that the only way to grind it now is through leveling up makes this even worse than the old ip grind and longer, I don't want to have to invest months of effort just to to get a 2 6300 champions and a rune page to go along with it.  This is a broken system that I and many others absolutely detest, but I have to commend riot games for trying something risky, although in retrospect I seriously do not know how this idea got passed.    

     While the new update is nice in certain areas, such as the revamped runes pages being merged with masteries, the level cap being unlocked to infinite, the changes to masteries ,the way runes and keystones work in game, along with the addition of new features that come with certain keystones.  If feel this does add a level of challenge and mixes up the game play in a positive way that promotes strategic thinking.

     **_I think the largest issue I have coming out of this new update, is that with this new system it promotes us to dump money on Riot Points _**and honestly that killed the game my buds and I, as we are all very low income and cannot afford the luxury of having to buy rp to ensure I get the champions in the meta.  I honestly feel alienated by this as do a large portion of fanbase does.  Bad show Riot Games, bad show indeed.

-One Angry Customer {{champion:43}}
